Question: The M.E.N.D. BioSimulator Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
The M.E.N.D. BioSimulator

Product 1: MIASfacial
 - Facial Asymmetry Quantification
 - Filler Procedure Monitoring System

Product 2: N-UDS
 - Non-invasive Urodynamic Test System

Product 3: Blood Glucose Monitoring System
 - Predicting and Monitoring Blood Glucose Levels
